basic.description:
Data models: relational, entity-relationship. Relational query languages: relational algebra and SQL. Relational database design. Application interfaces and embedded SQL. Storage and indexing.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Database Management Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     CISC124 and CISC204 
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from CISC332; COMM392
